name: kokopu
description: A JavaScript library implementing the chess game rules and providing tools to read/write the standard chess file formats.
author: Yoann Le Montagner <yo35@melix.net>

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
scripts.build: browserify -s kokopu index.js > kokopu.js && uglifyjs kokopu.js > kokopu.min.js
